animeTitle: Chuukou Ikkan!! Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Kimetsu no Utage Tokubetsu-hen (Dub)
otherNames: Kimetsu Academy: Special Edition, 中高一貫!!キメツ学園物語 ～鬼滅の宴=特別編=～
synopsis: These specials were originally shown at the Kimetsu no Utage live event which was held on October 20th 2019 in Tokyo. The cast members present at the event did a live dubbing of the characters.
